faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common inquiries about AI Video Upscaling

items.title: What video resolutions can be upscaled?
items.description: We support upscaling from various resolutions including 480p, 720p, and 1080p to stunning 4K quality.

items.title: Is there a limit on the file size of videos I can upload?
items.description: Yes, users can upload videos up to 2GB per file for processing. New features will support larger sizes in future updates.

items.title: Can I use upscaled videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! Any user can utilize the enhanced videos for both personal and commercial projects.

items.title: How does WaveSpeed ensure video quality during enhancement?
items.description: Our AI utilizes deep learning models to analyze and enhance every frame, ensuring clarity, color accuracy, and detail preservation throughout the video.
